body: $VENAR $AAPL $GOOG I’ve watched so much Dateline that I can never get married.

$PATH Russia is the cause why the market is down. Russian propaganda and fake news they vomited in the social media which caused Brexit, Clown Election in the US, Viktor Orban reelection, all these clowneries which destroyed confidence in elections were done by bots. Russia was paying $10 million a quarter to Uipath to spread propaganda against the West via bots. So, its a very good thing that they stopped this toxic relationship. Now, the interest rates hikes. This should not affect so much because 1) we have zero debt, and 2) if other companies suffer because of rate hikes and the whole economy goes to recession, bots will be a part of the solution to keep running. This software is so good that it will win regardless of the scenario. That is why I still see this company as the most valuable company in the whole world. Learning uipath is a must and it is much more important than your monopoly $MSFT office subscription, your $AAPL upgrade or your useless order from exploitative $AMZN

$AAPL $AMC $SPY $QQQ $AMD I’ll leave you with this. The market isn’t about being a day trader or going long term. It’s simply choosing to seize the opportunity when it comes. All you have to do is be patient and follow a good amount of stocks, let’s say 15-20, and the right opportunity will come your way. It does not come down to the amount of trades. It’s truly a game of patience. Best wishes! ✌🏻
